name: Nasy
bio: I like Haskell very much. Although I'm not that good at it, I hope everyone will fall in love with her. I will do my best to help everyone. Besides, I come from China, so if you use Chinese, I can also understand it.

name: Antoine Leblanc
bio: The one thing I enjoy more than writing Haskell is sharing the joy! I have worked in the past on teaching it to beginners, with the explicit goal of demistifying it; mentoring was the logical next step.
